title: I never stay at the same hotel twice but this is a must stay!
text:
I am going over in April to the Kimberley to celebrate my 50th, I have stayed at many NYC hotels and while they've been great I have chosen to come back to the Kimberley, the reason is simple, great staff, wonderful service, perfect location and wonderful rooms. The rooms are spacious with great bathrooms and a separate dining/living area which my friend is able to stay on the sofa bed. I just wouldn't be able to recommend any of the hotels I've stayed at, and they were excellent as much as the Kimberley. Once you find the perfect mix why bother looking elsewhere!
Room Tip: Love the luxury one bedroom suite with the double sinks, perfect for friends. See more room tips
